MealPlan_campusoptions_restaurant.name: Olivia's Authentic Chicken
MealPlan_campusoptions_restaurant.address: 1396 Blvd. De Maisonneuve Ouest, Montreal, Quebec H3G 2E4

MealPlan_dietaryrestrictions_mealplan.name: Grilled Chicken
MealPlan_dietaryrestrictions_mealplan.description: Main ingredient: Chicken breast. Ingredients: Olive oil, garlic, black pepper, salt, lemon juice, rosemary. Nutritional highlights: Calories: 165 kcal per 100g serving, Protein: 31g, Fat: 3.6g.

MealPlan_dietaryrestrictions_mealplan.name: Caesar Salad
MealPlan_dietaryrestrictions_mealplan.description: Main ingredients: Romaine lettuce, grilled chicken (optional), Parmesan cheese, croutons. Dressing: Caesar dressing (egg yolks, olive oil, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, garlic, Parmesan cheese, black pepper). Nutritional highlights: Calories: ~250 kcal, Protein: ~16g, Fat: 15-20g.

MealPlan_dietaryrestrictions_mealplan.name: Tofu Stir Fry
MealPlan_dietaryrestrictions_mealplan.description: Main ingredients: Firm tofu, carrots, broccoli, bell peppers. Sauce: Soy sauce, oyster sauce (or vegan sauce), garlic, ginger, sesame oil. Nutritional highlights: Calories: ~200 kcal, Protein: ~13.5g, Fat: 12g, Carbs: 10-15g.

MealPlan_dietaryrestrictions_mealplan.name: Steak
MealPlan_dietaryrestrictions_mealplan.description: Main ingredient: Beef tenderloin or ribeye steak. Seasoning: Salt, black pepper, olive oil, butter, garlic, rosemary. Nutritional highlights: Calories: 242 kcal, Protein: 22g, Fat: 17g.

MealPlan_dietaryrestrictions_mealplan.name: Vegan Burger
MealPlan_dietaryrestrictions_mealplan.description: Main ingredients: Tofu or black beans patty, whole wheat bun. Toppings: Lettuce, tomato, avocado, vegan cheese, vegan mayo. Nutritional highlights: Calories: ~400 kcal, Protein: ~20g, Fat: 15g, Carbs: 30g.

MealPlan_mealinstructions.name: Grilled Chicken
MealPlan_mealinstructions.steps:
Marinate: In a bowl, mix olive oil, minced garlic, lemon juice, salt, black pepper, and chopped rosemary. Coat the chicken breasts evenly. Allow the chicken to marinate for at least 30 minutes.
Preheat Grill: Heat your grill or grill pan to medium-high heat.
Grill: Place the marinated chicken on the grill. Cook for 5–7 minutes per side or until the internal temperature reaches a safe level (about 165°F or 74°C).
Rest & Serve: Remove the chicken from the grill and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing. Serve warm.

MealPlan_mealinstructions.name: Caesar Salad
MealPlan_mealinstructions.steps:
Prepare the Dressing: Whisk together egg yolks, olive oil, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, minced garlic, grated Parmesan, and black pepper until smooth and emulsified.
Prepare Lettuce: Wash and chop the romaine lettuce into bite-sized pieces.
Toss Salad: In a large bowl, toss the lettuce with the prepared dressing.
Add Toppings: Sprinkle in croutons, add extra Parmesan cheese, and top with sliced grilled chicken if desired.
Serve: Enjoy immediately for the best texture.

MealPlan_mealinstructions.name: Steak
MealPlan_mealinstructions.steps:
Room Temperature: Remove the steak from the refrigerator and let it sit for about 30 minutes to come to room temperature.
Season: Pat the steak dry with paper towels. Season both sides generously with salt and black pepper.
Preheat Skillet: Heat a heavy skillet or grill pan over high heat. Add olive oil and a small knob of butter.
Sear: Place the steak in the pan along with crushed garlic and a sprig of rosemary. Sear for 3–5 minutes on each side, depending on your preferred doneness.
Baste: Spoon the butter-garlic mixture over the steak during cooking to enhance flavor.
Rest & Serve: Remove the steak from the pan and let it rest for 5–10 minutes before slicing. Serve with your favorite side dish.

MealPlan_mealplansearchbar.name: Grilled Chicken
MealPlan_mealplansearchbar.description: Main ingredient: Chicken breast. Ingredients: Olive oil, garlic, black pepper, salt, lemon juice, rosemary. Nutritional highlights: Calories: 165 kcal (per 3.5 oz / 100g serving), Protein: 31g (per 3.5 oz / 100g serving), Fat: 3.6g (mainly healthy fats from olive oil).

MealPlan_mealplansearchbar.name: Caesar Salad
MealPlan_mealplansearchbar.description: Main ingredients: Romaine lettuce, grilled chicken (optional), Parmesan cheese, croutons. Dressing: Caesar dressing (egg yolks, olive oil, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, garlic, Parmesan cheese, black pepper). Nutritional highlights: Calories: 200–300 kcal (for a medium serving with chicken), Protein: 12g–20g (if chicken is added), Fat: 15g–20g (due to the Caesar dressing).

MealPlan_mealplansearchbar.name: Tofu Stir Fry
MealPlan_mealplansearchbar.description: Main ingredients: Firm tofu, carrots, broccoli, bell peppers. Sauce: Soy sauce, oyster sauce (or vegan sauce), garlic, ginger, sesame oil. Nutritional highlights: Calories: 180–220 kcal (per serving, depending on tofu portion), Protein: 12g–15g (from tofu), Fat: 12g (from sesame oil and tofu), Carbs: 10g–15g (from vegetables).

MealPlan_mealplansearchbar.name: Steak
MealPlan_mealplansearchbar.description: Main ingredient: Beef tenderloin or ribeye steak. Seasoning: Salt, black pepper, olive oil, butter, garlic, rosemary. Nutritional highlights: Calories: 242 kcal (per 3.5 oz / 100g serving of beef tenderloin), Protein: 22g (per 3.5 oz / 100g serving), Fat: 17g (depending on the cut of meat), Iron: High (great for muscle growth and blood health).

MealPlan_mealplansearchbar.name: Vegan Burger
MealPlan_mealplansearchbar.description: Main ingredients: Tofu or black beans (for the patty), whole wheat bun. Toppings: Lettuce, tomato, avocado, vegan cheese, vegan mayo (or tofu-based mayo). Nutritional highlights: Calories: 350–450 kcal (depending on the size of the patty and toppings), Protein: 15g–25g (from tofu or black beans), Fat: 15g (mainly from avocado and vegan mayo), Carbs: 30g (mainly from the bun and beans).

MealPlan_quickmeal.name: Caesar Salad
MealPlan_quickmeal.cooking_materials: Main ingredient: Romaine lettuce, Parmesan cheese, Croutons. Ingredients: Egg yolks, Olive oil, Lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, Garlic (minced), Parmesan cheese (grated), Black pepper. Steps: Prepare the Dressing: Whisk together egg yolks, olive oil, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, minced garlic, grated Parmesan, and black pepper until the dressing is smooth and emulsified. Prepare Lettuce: Wash and chop the romaine lettuce into bite-sized pieces. Toss Salad: In a large bowl, toss the lettuce with the prepared dressing. Add Toppings: Sprinkle in croutons, add extra Parmesan cheese, and top with sliced grilled chicken if desired. Serve: Enjoy immediately for the best texture.

MealPlan_quickmeal.name: Egg Sandwich
MealPlan_quickmeal.cooking_materials: Main ingredient: 1-2 eggs, 2 slices of bread (white, whole wheat, or multigrain), Butter or olive oil (for cooking), Salt and black pepper (to taste), Optional toppings: lettuce, tomato slices, cheese, and mayonnaise. Steps: Toast the Bread: Toast the bread slices until they are golden and slightly crisp. You can use a toaster or toast them in a pan with a little butter for extra flavor. Cook the Egg: Heat a small amount of butter or olive oil in a non-stick pan over medium heat. Crack the egg into the pan and cook it as a fried egg (sunny side up or over-easy) or scramble it, according to your preference. Season with salt and black pepper while cooking. Assemble the Sandwich: Place the cooked egg on one slice of toasted bread. Add any optional toppings you like. Cover with the other slice of toast and gently press together. Serve and Enjoy: Your egg sandwich is ready to be served. Enjoy it as a quick breakfast or a satisfying snack!
